name: ARC
summary: ARC Help to reduce your code. and provide you lot's of userful function pre installed
description:
ARC is really helpfull library. user don't have to right code again and again. ARC provide lot's of basic function related (Alert (POP UP).

String).
also we try to implement more helpful function in framework.
